data.title: Amar’e Stoudemire | American basketball player
data.meta_description: Other articles where Amar’e Stoudemire is discussed: New York Knicks: …soon brought in star players Amar’e Stoudemire (in 2010) and Carmelo Anthony (during the 2010–11 season) in an attempt to reenergize the franchise and its fans.
data.text:
In New York Knicks

…soon brought in star players Amar’e Stoudemire (in 2010) and Carmelo Anthony (during the 2010–11 season) in an attempt to reenergize the franchise and its fans.

Read More

In Phoenix Suns

…team drafted high school phenomenon Amar’e Stoudemire in 2002 and reacquired point guard Steve Nash (who was originally drafted by the Suns) in 2004. Nash’s up-tempo playing style perfectly complemented the skill sets of Stoudemire and forward Shawn Marion, and the Suns transformed into an exciting, high-scoring team. The team’s…

Read More

In Steve Nash

The team lost aggressive forward Amar’e Stoudemire to injury in the next preseason and yet, despite the absence of one of the league’s best young players, once again appeared in the conference finals in 2005–06. Nash himself was even better, averaging a personal-best 18.8 points per game. In 2006–07, with…

Read More
